DAY 1 – ARRIVAL TOKYO

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

  • Tokyo Airport to city hotel
  • English speaking guide
  • Hotel Check-In & relax
  • Dinner at a local Restaurant
  • After Dinner transfer to hotel

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/f238e9ogqqq.jpg” _builder_version=”3.12″]

 

[/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

DAY 2 – TOKYO CITY TOUR

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

  • Breakfast at Hotel
  • Depart to Tokyo Full Day City Tour
  • Asakusa Sensoji Kanon Temple & Nakamise Street for Shopping
  • Tokyo Imperial Palace (Photo stop)
  • Lunch at a local Restaurant
  • Tokyo Tower (150 meter)
  • Odaiba – Kaihin Park, Statue of Liberty, Toyota Mega Web, Venus Fort,100 Yen Store
  • Dinner at a local Restaurant
  • After Dinner transfer to Hotel

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_image admin_label=”Package Image” src=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/_uin-pffj7c.jpg” align=”center” _builder_version=”3.12″ animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”right” animation_intensity_fold=”20%”]

 

[/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

DAY 3-Tokyo – Mt. Fuji – Tokyo / Day tour of Mt Fuji

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

  • Breakfast at Hotel
  • Depart to Day tour of Mt Fuji
  • Mt. Fuji 5th station (Subject to weather conditions)
  • Lunch at a local Restaurant
  • Lake Ashi Cruise
  • Gotemba Peace Park
  • Depart to Tokyo
  • Dinner at a local Restaurant
  • After Dinner transfer to Hotel

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_image admin_label=”Package Image” src=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/8sozj8jf0s8.jpg” _builder_version=”3.12″ animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”right” animation_intensity_fold=”20%”]

 

[/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

DAY 4-Tokyo – Hiroshima / Half day city tour of Hiroshima

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

  • Pack 1 small bag for 1-night stay
  • Depart Tokyo to Hiroshima by Shinkansen Bullet train
  • Arrive into Hiroshima
  • Lunch at a local Restaurant
  • Hiroshima Peace Park & Atomic Bomb Dome
  • Dinner at a local Restaurant
  • After Dinner transfer to Hotel check in

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

DAY 5-Hiroshima – Miyajima Island – Osaka

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

  • Breakfast at Hotel
  • Miyajima and Itsukushima Jinja (By ferry)
  • Lunch at a local Restaurant
  • Depart to Osaka
  • Dinner at a local Restaurant
  • Receive Luggage
  • After Dinner transfer to Hotel check in

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/n-cmlapjfi.jpg” _builder_version=”3.12″]

 

[/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

DAY 6-Osaka – Kyoto – Osaka / Full Day City Tour of Kyoto

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

  • Breakfast at Hotel
  • Depart to Kyoto
  • Arashiyama Bamboo Grove & Togetsu Bridge
  • Lunch at a local Restaurant
  • Kinkaku-Ji Golden Pavilion
  • Fushimi Inari Taisha Shrine
  • Depart to Osaka
  • Dinner at a local Restaurant
  • After Dinner transfer to Hotel

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

DAY 7-Osaka – Nara –City Tour of Osaka / City Tour of Nara and Osaka

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

  • Breakfast at Hotel
  • Depart to Nara
  • Toda-ji Temple & Deer park
  • Lunch at a local Restaurant
  • Depart to Osaka
  • Osaka Castle
  • Dotonbori
  • Dinner at a local Restaurant
  • After Dinner transfer to Hotel

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/dksk8szlrn0.jpg” _builder_version=”3.12″]

 

[/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_image src=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/kokxob8550q.jpg” _builder_version=”3.12″]

 

[/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

DAY 9 – DEPART OSAKA

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

  • Breakfast at Hotel
  • Depart to Airport
